select * from files,boards where boards.delYn='N' and files.fileNo=boards.fileNo and files.fileNo in ( select fileNo from boards where boardType = 'detailLon');

mapper.update: update files, boards set files.fileName = #{fileName}, files.fileURL = #{fileURL}, files.regDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') where files.fileNo = boards.fileNo and files.fileNo in ( select fileNo from boards where boardNo = #{boardNo})
update files set fileName = #{fileName}, fileURL = #{fileURL}, regDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') where fileNo = #{fileNo}
mapper.insert: insert into boards (boardTitle, boardContents, regDate, boardType, fileNo) values (#{boardTitle},#{boardContents},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),#{boardType}, #{fileNo});
mapper.update: update files, boards set files.delYn = 'Y' where files.fileNo = boards.fileNo and files.fileNo in ( select fileNo from boards where boardNo = #{boardNo})
update youtube set likeNum = likeNum + 1 where vNum = #{vNum};
